item.title: WATCH: A-Rod sinks half-court shot, winning student $10,000
item.description: Former baseball superstar Alex Rodriguez nailed the shot at a Bucknell University basketball game, and the payday went to a lucky student.

item.title: Pope Francis 'resting' after 10th night in hospital, Vatican says
item.description: "The night passed well, the Pope slept and is resting," the Vatican press office said in a short statement.
